splash.main_error: Some params are missing. Can't we go ahead
splash.main_error_sub: Something gone wrong opening the page
splash.i_agree: I agree to the general user conditions

login.error_voucher_code_sub: It seems that your voucher code is not correct

social.auth_error_sub: Wrong username or password, please try again or Sign up.
social.auth_error_sub_expired: This account is expired, please Sign Up again.

email.error_code_sub: Something went wrong, please check your email address
email.auth_error_sub: Wrong username or password, please try again or Sign up.
email.auth_error_sub_expired: This account is expired, please Sign Up again.
email.wait_skip_auth_text: Enter you email, click on 'Sign Up and Navigate' and you will be able to browse the internet.
email.we_are_sending_email_code:
1) Enter your email and click on "Sign up"
2) Open the email you received and click on the link to login (you have 5 minutes)
3) Alternatively, authenticate with the email and the numeric code you received

NB If the link does not work properly, make sure you are connected to the wireless network of this establishment
email.we_are_sending_email_code_signin:
Enter your email and access code to log in.

If you haven't registered yet, go back and click on "Sign up".
email.not_code_explain: Is it the first time you are connecting to this Wi-Fi?
email.not_code_explain_skip_auth: Enter you email to continue browsing.

sms.error_code_sub: Something went wrong on sending password (please choose the right international prefix for your number or check you don't have reach the max sending SMS number)
sms.auth_error_sub: Wrong username or password, please try again or Sign up.
sms.auth_error_sub_expired: This account is expired, please Sign Up again.
sms.we_are_sending_sms_code:
1) Enter your telephone number and click on "Sign up"
2) Open the SMS received and click on the link to log in
3) Alternatively log in with your telephone and the numeric code you received

NB If the link does not work properly, make sure you are connected to the wireless network of this establishment
sms.we_are_sending_sms_code_signin:
Enter your telephone number and access code to log in.

If you haven't registered yet, go back and click on "Sign up".
sms.not_code_explain: Is it the first time you are connecting to this Wi-Fi?

whatsapp.we_are_sending_whatsapp_code: In a few moments you will be redirected to Whatsapp. Send the pre-compiled text to login to the hotspot.
whatsapp.auth_error_sub: Something went wrong, the reasons could be the following: 1)The data entered may not be correct. 2)The voucher you are using could be expired. 3)You could have reached your maximum daily time. 4)You could have reached your maximum daily traffic.
